oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The ||ua (Fox) speaks, saying 'Thou art thinking thou art awake' and makes the Koranna sleep, even though they are supposed to be keeping watch. 1) |han=kass'o heard this story from his maternal grandfather (Tsatsi); the Fox was a person of the Early Race, 2) p.7593v: see Beasts of prey were once people, 3) p.7594v: see Sneezing, 4) p.7606v: see The Korannas brought guns (while they felt that they had not a little cattle), 5) This story is found in Book VIII-18.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Koranna commando destroyed by ||ua
